    Class BallDemo - a short demonstration showing animation with the Canvas class. Demonstrates the BoxBall Class

        startY - initializes the balls starting X position
        diameter - sets the balls diameter and size

      • populateScene

        public void populateScene(int _totalBalls,
                          int boxLength)
        Initializes the scene by creating and distributing ball Objects into the scene space and the balls arrayList for management.
        Parameters:
        _totalBalls - The total number of ball objects to generate
        boxLength - The Length of one side of the square box.

      • putBoundingPoints

        public void putBoundingPoints(BoxBall ball,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              Point point)
        Initializes the boundingPoints hashMap within a ball object with the given point name and value key map relationship.
        Parameters:
        ball - The ball object to initialize
        name - The name of the boundingPoint
        point - The Point Object Value
